name: defaulty
description: Copies missing properties to the target object.

scripts.postversion: npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Fabio Ricali
